Description:
We reach the depths of the forest and there we see a humanoid doe blocking our path. As we approach, she tells us:

(Balina) "More werewolves... I am, Balina, protector of this forest and I won't let you pass. But this is strange... what does a pigman do next to these savages? Besides, you look like a healer... What are you doing on the front line of combat?"

(Ottis) "Oink... well... I don't know. I just wanted to help... Oink, it's true, this war and the front is not for me... I should meditate on this.
DescriptionAction: Sorry guys, she's right and I can't face her... Oink... I can't go on like this, I have to go and reflect."
